complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Setup Supabase Project and Next.js Configuration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into subtasks for setting up the Supabase project, configuring environment variables, and creating client/server utilities.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves setting up a new project with Supabase, configuring environment variables, and creating utilities for client and server interactions. It requires understanding of both Supabase and Next.js, as well as TypeScript configuration, making it moderately complex.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Create Database Schema and Row Level Security Policies
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the task into subtasks for creating each database table and implementing RLS policies for each table.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Designing a database schema with RLS policies involves complex SQL operations and security considerations. It requires careful planning to ensure data integrity and security, especially with multiple user roles and access levels.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Outline subtasks for implementing sign up, login, logout, and auth state management.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Building an authentication system with Supabase involves integrating various components and ensuring secure handling of user data. It requires knowledge of authentication flows and state management, adding to its complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for building the main library page, detail page, and implementing responsive design.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves creating public-facing pages with responsive design and filtering capabilities. It requires integration with the existing design system and ensuring SEO best practices, making it moderately complex.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Case Creation and Management System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into subtasks for creating the case form, management panel, and implementing server actions.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves creating forms, managing user cases, and implementing server-side logic with RLS. It requires handling user permissions and ensuring data consistency, adding to its complexity.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Build Comment System for Published Cases
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Outline subtasks for creating comment components, implementing server actions, and styling.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Implementing a comment system involves creating UI components, handling authentication, and ensuring real-time updates. It requires integration with the existing system and styling, making it moderately complex.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement Admin Publishing and Moderation System
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Divide the task into subtasks for implementing admin checks, UI elements, and server actions for moderation.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: This task involves creating admin functionalities for publishing and moderating content. It requires implementing access controls and ensuring secure handling of admin actions, adding to its complexity.

complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Create subtasks for updating CTAs and integrating featured cases on the landing page.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Updating the landing page involves modifying existing elements and ensuring design consistency. It requires careful integration with the case library, but is less complex than building new features.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Implement UI Components and Design System Integration
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Outline subtasks for creating each UI component and ensuring design system integration.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Creating reusable UI components requires attention to design consistency and accessibility. It involves integrating with the existing design system and ensuring component reusability, making it moderately complex.

complexityAnalysis.taskTitle: Add Category Filtering and Search Functionality
complexityAnalysis.expansionPrompt: Break down the task into subtasks for implementing filtering UI and handling URL parameters.
complexityAnalysis.reasoning: Implementing category filtering involves creating UI elements and managing state with URL parameters. It requires ensuring responsive design and usability, but is less complex than other tasks.
